name: Shall we date?: Actor to be
storyline:
I was transferred to the Opera School I always wanted to go to. The students are all hoping to become the next star, and they’re all very handsome.

Cocky, cold, wicked, lazy. They’re all very different. I hope our performance will be a success. It’s time for a story of dreams and love…and the curtains are about to open.
summary: Shall we date?:Actor to be is a visual novel type Dating Simulation Game set at the Opera School.
